updateModelBound() - Method in class se.ltu.android.demo.scene.Spatial
Updates the bounding volume for this spatial
updateModelBound() - Method in class se.ltu.android.demo.scene.TriMesh
Updates the bounding volume for this mesh This method uses the mesh's world transformation matrix so ensure that the matrix is valid (or call updateTransform() on this mesh before calling this method).
updateTransform() - Method in class se.ltu.android.demo.scene.CameraLeaf
Updates the world transformation matrix for this spatial Note: this is currently unsupported.

updateTransform() - Method in class se.ltu.android.demo.scene.Spatial

updateWorldBound(boolean) - Method in class se.ltu.android.demo.scene.Node
Updates the world bound of this node and its children.
updateWorldBound(Spatial) - Method in class se.ltu.android.demo.scene.Node
Updates the world bound for this node based on the world bound of the calling child and propagate the changes up to the root
updateWorldBound(boolean) - Method in class se.ltu.android.demo.scene.PickBox
Updates the world bound based on the model bound set for this object.
updateWorldBound(boolean) - Method in class se.ltu.android.demo.scene.Spatial
